name: Holiday Lodge

reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I was very nervous about staying here. However, everything else was booked so I didn't have much choice. I was very pleasantly surprised. Although it is obviously old, the room was clean, the bed comfortable and and the amenities satisfactory. It's not the Ritz but, for $90, what do you expect. The continental breakfast is very basic - just danish and coffee. It's very convenient to Highway 49 and not far from the main part of town. The only negative - I had my dog with me and there was really no good place to walk her.
reviews.title: Basic but good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we came from redding Ca. to Grass Valley, a place we love. We wanted to keep the cost down so we called around for the least expensive hotel price. It was an older motel.
reviews.title: worst place i've ever stayed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we started to go to bed we turned the covers back and found a crack pipe under the pillow.
reviews.title: Friendly, Clean and Quaint

reviews.text: We went to the resident mgrs. room and showed her what we found and told her we were going to call the police, she said not to she would take care of it. We immediately got out of there.
reviews.title: Practical basic motel

reviews.text: Stayed here for the first time with my fiance and we enjoyed it. When you drive up you can tell it's an older building, but it's well-maintained and has lots of charm. You can tell that someone put a lot of work into the garden, the pool is clean and open, and the breakfast patio area was so pretty. The breakfast was modest and simple but did the trick. It's free, afterall. And the price of our room was very affordable. We stayed in one of the theme rooms- I forgot what they called it but it was cute! Reminded me of a movie from the 50s or something! Anyway, the front desk ladies were kind of professional. Overall I approve! Saw some older, negative comments and I guess they must've changed the management or something because this place was lovely and we'd certainly stay again if we ever pass through!
reviews.title: Decent, clean

reviews.text: I really have to say the online photos looked great! But when we got there that was a whole different story. The people stared at us like we were from a different planet ? And the office staff seem over worked and didn't know what they were doing? The room looked like it was dirty and the bath towels were well? I didn't want to use them? And the airconditioner keep failing on us? And the refer wasn't working. Also, we tried to go to sleep at 10:30 on saturday night and there were smokers out side our room the NON SMOKING ROOM and talking loud and using foul words and our kids heard the bad words and we couldn't go to sleep because they were so loud. I peeked my head out the door for a second time and said something to the people who were talking loud, They said "sorry" and went in a few minutes later. The next day we got up got dressed hated to take a shower cause we had to use their towels, but we couldn't get out fast enough. My daughter and I went to check out gave the staff person the key and she said thanks, turned around and said nothing else and she looked at us like "you can go" and the breakfast table was empty, the guy who was suppose to set up the table walked right by and did nothing and seem as if he didn't care? I care enough to send this information to tell you as a traveler beware of where you stay really do your research before you enter into a hotel. READ READ READ! caution HOTEL is a DUMP!!
reviews.title: What a Dump

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is not at all what I expected.
reviews.title: Bates Motel?

reviews.text: I did see the pictures online and thought it would be OK.
reviews.title: Nice big rooms and friendly hosts

reviews.text: When we arrived we checked in and went to our room.
reviews.title: Are you Kidding me?
wonderful!!!
reviews.text: What a nightmare.

I have stayed at this hotel multiple times and everytime I stay there I get nothing but good service. The housekeepers are very friendly and are constantly asking if you need anything. The office manager is a wonderful lady , she gave me a card with her personal number on it and told me I could call anytime of night if I needed anything. In the middle of the night I needed a heater and she rushed to my call and brought me a heater. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone one looking for a great room where your treated like family.
reviews.title: A place where your treated like family
Great family enviroment!
reviews.text: I have three small children and I highly recommend this place for anyone who has kids! They have a great breakfast thats included with your room. The maids were so sweet my son spilled his juice and they were right there and cleaned it up instantly! If you are traveling with children or alone I really recommend this place! I've already booked a room for the summer because I want to try their lovely pool! They even have theme rooms how fun!!

I was supposed to stay here back in August '10 but had a change of plans. I called to cancel my room and was told it was "taken care of." That turned out to not be the case and I was charged. I cancelled over 24 hours in advance, but they request over 48 hours notice. However, there was a soccer tournament in town and all hotels were booked. They were even booked that night, but kept my room unoccupied! I understand they didn't have to refund my money, but they could have easily rented out the room to someone else. It would have been the nice thing to do.
reviews.title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

reviews.text: When I called to speak with them, I was treated to just terrible customer service. I got absolutely nowhere with the front desk person and was then transferred to the manager who was even less help. Because I didn't get the person's name when I cancelled my reservation, they wouldn't refund my $100. I ended up giving up because I had other things going on in my life at the time (my father had just died... the reason I had to cancel in the first place). Don't stay at this place unless you want terrible customer service.
reviews.title: This place is a DUMP

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we rented a room for the holidays when we arrive for our room. The room is cold we look around to find out why room is so cold and there is no frame work around air condition unit and cold air is pouring in. This place needs to be closed down by the health department I would not recomend this place at all and good luck getting your money back
reviews.title: Overpriced, underwhelmed

reviews.text: I arrived at this hotel after driving all day into the early evening.
reviews.title: Unable to honor my confirmed reservation on Labor Day weekend

reviews.text: The desk clerk was nice and started the check-in process. She located our reservation but no rooms were available.
reviews.title: We liked it - good value

reviews.text: The deck clerk was attempting to find us another hotel while I called the travel agent.
reviews.title: Management changed the ambiance of the lodge

reviews.text: Our travel agent (a major company) who has never failed us before stated their system showed the hotel still had open rooms. What?
reviews.title: Holiday Lodge is comfortable and very clean

likes.disliked: — There was nothing we didn't like

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I let the desk clerk speak with the travel agent using my cellphone. She stated (to the travel agent) this type of problem had been happening and she was sorry but they had no rooms available. It appears the hotel reservation system doesn't work correctly with a major travel agent.
reviews.title: Terrible Dumpy Motel

description: Rustic lodge with modern guest comforts; located one mile from town center, near restaurants, close to attractions.
